title: Qurʾān (Arabic, Uthmani text)
author: Divine Revelation
summary: The holy book of Islam, containing the word of God as revealed to the Prophet Muhammad. This manuscript features the Uthmani text, one of the earliest standardized versions of the Quranic text.

title: Torah / Tevrat (Hebrew, Masoretic)
author: Divine Revelation
summary: The first five books of the Hebrew Bible, containing the foundational laws and narratives of Judaism. This Masoretic text represents the traditional Hebrew version preserved by Jewish scribes.
